subject: Personal Finance
title: Regret Aversion
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Regret Aversion.

hook.text: You almost bought Apple stock in 2003. The regret of missing out haunts you for years.

buildup.text: Regret aversion makes us avoid decisions where we might later feel we chose wrong.

discovery.text: It causes two opposite behaviors: never selling losers and never buying anything risky.

twist.text: The fear of future regret often causes worse outcomes than the regret itself would.

climax.text: Investors who diversify and automate remove emotion. No active decision means no regret.

punchline.text: The fear of regret is worse than regret.

quiz.question: What does regret aversion cause people to do?
options: Avoid decisions that might cause future regret
